sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from "react"; import { MDBInput, MDBInputSelect, MDBFormInline, MDBBtn, MDBContainer, MDBRow, MDBCol } from "mdbreact"; import DocsLink from "./../components/docsLink"; import SectionContainer from "./../components/sectionContainer"; class InputPage extends Component { constructor() { super(); this.state = { value: "Controlled input with value", iconInput: "eye-slash", typeInput: "password" }; this.nextInputRef = null; } componentDidMount() { document.querySelectorAll(".iconHover").forEach(el => (el.style.cursor = "pointer")); } handleSubmit = event => { alert("MDBInput value: " + this.state.value); event.preventDefault(); }; saveToState = value => this.setState({ value }); getValue = value => console.log(value); handleChange = event => this.setState({ value: event.target.value }); changeFocus = () => this.nextInputRef.focus(); mouseEnter = () => { this.setState({ iconInput: "eye", typeInput: "text" }); }; mouseLeave = () => { this.setState({ iconInput: "eye-slash", typeInput: "password" }); }; render() { return ( (this.nextInputRef = ref)} icon="envelope" /> alert("Wait! This is an alert!")} /> Submit Login
@
